Package gui.OrderScreens

package gui.OrderScreens

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CheckoutScreenController
    This class represents the controller for the CheckoutScreen FXML file.
    DeliveryOprtionsScreenController
    This class represents the controller of the delivery options screen, which allows the user to choose the delivery method and address.
    GrabOrderScreenController
    This class is the controller class for the grab order screen, this class is responsible for the grab order screen's functions.
    PaymentScreenController
    The PaymentScreenController class is a controller class for the PaymentScreen.fxml file.
    PostPaymentController
    The PostPaymentController class is the controller class for the post payment screen.
    ProductCatalogScreenController
    The ProductCatalogScreenController class is the controller class for the Product Catalog Screen.
    ViewDeliveriesScreenController
    The ViewDeliveriesScreenController class is a controller class for the View Deliveries screen in the GUI.
